src:
山本昌臨時コーチがいきなり藤浪を直接指導　身ぶり手ぶりで“昌塾”開講

01 Nov 2019

　「阪神秋季キャンプ」（１日、安芸）
　秋季キャンプで臨時コーチを務める山本昌氏（５４）＝野球評論家＝が、いきなり動いた。前夜にチーム宿舎に到着後は選手、関係者のほぼ全員の前でまずは講演会を実施。練習参加初日となったこの日、最初に声を掛けたのは悩める右腕だ。
　キャッチボールが始まると、望月とコンビを組んでいた藤浪を呼び寄せて指導。直接、藤浪の腕をつかみながら、腕の振り方やリリースポイントを指導するだけでなく、チェンジアップの握りを勧めるなど、身ぶり手ぶりを交えて２人に付きっきりでのコーチングが行われた。
　指導は他の選手がキャッチボールを終えた後もしばらく続き、ライト外野の芝の上で３人だけが残っての“昌塾”を開講。自らボールを投げて手本を示すなど、熱心な指導がいきなり行われた。さらに、その後は大山にスローイング指導を行うなど、積極的に動いている。

Temporary coach Masaru Yamamoto suddenly provides direct instruction to Fujinami.

01 Nov 2019

"Hanshin Autumn Camp" (Aki, 1st)
Mr. Masaru Yamamoto (54), a baseball critic, who served as a temporary coach at the autumn camp suddenly moved. After arriving at the team dormitory the night before, a lecture was held in front of almost all the players and related parties. On the day that was the first day of practice, the first thing I called out was the right arm that worried me.
When the catch ball started, Fujinami, who had formed a combination with Mochizuki, was called for guidance. In addition to teaching Fujinami's arm directly and instructing how to swing the arm and release points, coaching was done with two gestures, with gestures and hand gestures.
The guidance lasted for a while after the other players finished the catch ball, and the “Changjuku” was held with only three people remaining on the grass in the light outfield. Enthusiastic instruction was given suddenly, such as throwing the ball and showing a model. After that, he has been actively moving, including throwing instruction to Oyama.
